channel.title: Posts on F1TENTH Journey | Nick Gurnard

item.title: Introduction to ROS
item.description: A Quick Note Hello! And welcome to my first post about my journey in F1TENTH. To begin this journey, I learned as much ROS as I could in order to solidy a solid framework for dealing with multiple sensors and data pipelines. Since ROS1 and ROS2 use the same core concepts, I decided to use ROS noetic as my distribution since I am new to ROS. ROS2 has more features and tools, which will only complicate learning the basics.
